title: Can't play draft for some reason.
body: When queueing for a game on summoner's rift I can't select the game mode that I actually want. The only thing I can play is blind for some reason. (This goes for both normal draft and ranked).

replies.body: I'm having this problem right now. Did you do anything to fix it? Did the problem go away on its own?
It's back up now for me at least.
